mapper.delete: DELETE FROM channel_room WHERE channel_id = #{id} AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT uid FROM channel_room WHERE channel_id = #{id}

SELECT r.uid, r.room_id AS roomId, r.tag_id AS tagId, r.room_tag AS roomTag, r.avatar AS avatar, r.type AS type, r.title AS title, u.erban_no AS erbanNo FROM room r LEFT JOIN users u ON u.uid = r.uid LEFT JOIN channel_room cr ON cr.uid = r.uid WHERE cr.channel_id = #{id}
